overview: Mr. Garrard is a founder of Total Technology Ventures, LLC (TTV), a venture capital firm based in Atlanta, Georgia with $120 million under management. Mr. Garrard earned a B.A. degree from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and a M.B.A. from the Goizueta Business School at Emory University. His community involvement includes board roles at the Georgia Department for Economic Development, the Make-a-Wish Foundation, and The Emory Eye Center. Mr. Garrard is a member of Leadership Georgiaâ€™s class of 2005 and a member of the Young Entrepreneurs Organization (YEO). He currently serves on the Board of Directors of Connecture, Inc., Perimeter Internetworking Corp., ControlScan, Inc., FTRANS Corp., Bluepoint Solutions, Interactive Advisory Software, Inc., iKobo, Inc., and Chain Reaction Ecommerce company.
